title: Install from Source Error on Ubuntu16
body_html:
Error message:

Scanning dependencies of target TH
[  5%] Building C object CMakeFiles/TH.dir/THGeneral.c.o
[ 10%] Building C object CMakeFiles/TH.dir/THHalf.c.o
[ 15%] Building C object CMakeFiles/TH.dir/THAllocator.c.o
[ 21%] Building C object CMakeFiles/TH.dir/THStorage.c.o
[ 26%] Building C object CMakeFiles/TH.dir/THTensor.c.o
cc: internal compiler error: Killed (program cc1)
Please submit a full bug report,
with preprocessed source if appropriate.
See <file:///usr/share/doc/gcc-5/README.Bugs> for instructions.
CMakeFiles/TH.dir/build.make:146: recipe for target 'CMakeFiles/TH.dir/THTensor.c.o' failed
make[2]: *** [CMakeFiles/TH.dir/THTensor.c.o] Error 4
CMakeFiles/Makefile2:60: recipe for target 'CMakeFiles/TH.dir/all' failed
make[1]: *** [CMakeFiles/TH.dir/all] Error 2
Makefile:116: recipe for target 'all' failed
make: *** [all] Error 2

My environment:

GCC

gcc --version
gcc (Ubuntu 5.2.1-22ubuntu2) 5.2.1 20151010
Copyright (C) 2015 Free Software Foundation, Inc.
This is free software; see the source for copying conditions.  There is NO
warranty; not even for MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.

CMAKE

cmake --version
cmake version 3.2.2

CMake suite maintained and supported by Kitware (kitware.com/cmake).

Python

python --version
Python 2.7.10

body:
### Error message:
```
Scanning dependencies of target TH
[  5%] Building C object CMakeFiles/TH.dir/THGeneral.c.o
[ 10%] Building C object CMakeFiles/TH.dir/THHalf.c.o
[ 15%] Building C object CMakeFiles/TH.dir/THAllocator.c.o
[ 21%] Building C object CMakeFiles/TH.dir/THStorage.c.o
[ 26%] Building C object CMakeFiles/TH.dir/THTensor.c.o
cc: internal compiler error: Killed (program cc1)
Please submit a full bug report,
with preprocessed source if appropriate.
See <file:///usr/share/doc/gcc-5/README.Bugs> for instructions.
CMakeFiles/TH.dir/build.make:146: recipe for target 'CMakeFiles/TH.dir/THTensor.c.o' failed
make[2]: *** [CMakeFiles/TH.dir/THTensor.c.o] Error 4
CMakeFiles/Makefile2:60: recipe for target 'CMakeFiles/TH.dir/all' failed
make[1]: *** [CMakeFiles/TH.dir/all] Error 2
Makefile:116: recipe for target 'all' failed
make: *** [all] Error 2
```
### My environment:
#### GCC
```
gcc --version
gcc (Ubuntu 5.2.1-22ubuntu2) 5.2.1 20151010
Copyright (C) 2015 Free Software Foundation, Inc.
This is free software; see the source for copying conditions.  There is NO
warranty; not even for MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.
```
#### CMAKE
```
cmake --version
cmake version 3.2.2

CMake suite maintained and supported by Kitware (kitware.com/cmake).
```
#### Python
```
python --version
Python 2.7.10
```
